name: Fishin' Is for the Company
description:
Earl and Gray are out on the lake, fishing and chatting about nothing and everything. They've got places to be tomorrow, but right now, it's just the two of them, idle and happy together. Game made for Gay Western Jam, built start to finish over the course of a couple days. 

Press Space/Click Mouse when dialog appears to advance. Otherwise, just sit back and enjoy some company.

Press Escape to exit game.

Music by Scott Holmes
